episodes.title: Jehovahs Witnesses: don't make friends outside the religion | Caleb and Sophia
episodes.description:
Caleb and Sophia get a new classmate from india, and a new classmate means there's a new mark in school to convert. jehovahs witnesses spend time in these three episodes (lesson 38: love your neighbor, lesson 25: making friends, lesson 45: why obey god if we cant see him) attempting to convince children that having friends inside the religion is best and that you should be preaching to kids at school rather than forming close friendships with them.

They're unsurprisingly very anti-LGBT, anti-women's rights, and anti-freedom in general. You MUST follow their rules. Doesn't matter if they can back them up with scripture. According to michael caboose, there were a few errors regarding mormons.

"1. although a man can be sealed to 2 women it is only after the 1st one dies. 2. caffiene is allowed just not coffee. 3. and although this only comes from people i have personally dealt with, there is no shunning at least that i have seen my family and friends who are mormon still accept me even though i am not mormon anymore."

I disagree with the notion that there isn't any shunning. It isn't as intense as in JW's, and it isn't found all over the religion, but it does happen. and some of them refuse caffeine in all its forms.

episodes.description:

Patreon:  https://www.patreon.com/telltaleatheist
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/telltaleatheist
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tell.tale.505

According to michael caboose, there were a few errors regarding mormons.

"1. although a man can be sealed to 2 women it is only after the 1st one dies. 2. caffiene is allowed just not coffee. 3. and although this only comes from people i have personally dealt with, there is no shunning at least that i have seen my family and friends who are mormon still accept me even though i am not mormon anymore."

I disagree with the notion that there isn't any shunning. It isn't as intense as in JW's, and it isn't found all over the religion, but it does happen. and some of them refuse caffeine in all its forms.

episodes.description:
a public note to everybody in my comments section. I DON'T BAN PEOPLE FOR COMMENTS UNLESS THEY ADD LINKS OR SPAM. but i've noticed people have had trouble commenting on some of my videos lately. i just want to make sure everybody knows that's not my doing. if you want, you can tweet at me if this happens and we'll find a solution

the word "Jehovah" now makes me cringe.

Jehovah's Witnesses have revealed that they believe the government will turn against them and outlaw their religion specifically. Take a look at their depiction of that scenario. It's CRAZY with a capital C. for real.

Original Video: https://youtu.be/wNtlDybBVA8
